text:
@realDonaldTrump Before Americans died, you spread harm/hate on Twitter...Then, you hid in a bunker like a baby...Then, you gassed Americans...Then you stood up a secret army.. And U know what?

Our loved ones are still dead of COVID-19 

Signed,

Families of 112,471 DEAD AMERICANS. 

.@SenateGOP

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
